thread.title: BioWare's new IP will arrive by the end of March 2018
thread.title_full: BioWare's new IP will arrive by the end of March 2018

title: BioWare's new IP will arrive by the end of March 2018
text:
BioWare's new IP will arrive by the end of March 2018 It's not an RPG. By Jeffrey Matulef Published 31/01/2017 
The mysterious new BioWare title teased back at E3 2014 seems poised for a reveal soon as EA noted that it will be out by the end of Q1 2018. 
EA CEO Andrew Wilson described the unannounced title as an "action-adventure title" and "not an RPG" in a financial call today. 
We don't know exactly what that will entail, though a tiny snippet of concept art was revealed in 2014. It depicted a day night cycle over rolling green fields with an outpost to the side of the frame. If one didn't know any better, it looked like it would fit right in with a Mass Effect title (granted it was teased at the end of a Mass Effect: Andromeda presentation). 
While details surrounding the title are slim, we know that Dragon Age lead writer David Gaider is on board , so RPG or not, expect some flavourful dialogue. Jeffrey Matulef is the best-dressed man in 1984. Based in Portland, OR he operates as Eurogamer's US news editor.
